name: CONSIGLIO NAZIONALE DEI CHIMICI
membership: EuCheMS: European Association for Chemical and Molecular Sciences
goal:
- To safeguard public interest with regards of chemistry and its applications
- To represent the interest of Chemistry professional practitioners
- To regulate professional conduct of practitioners
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020, Waste regulation, environmental protection, dangerous substances regulations, land, water an air pollution/protection, ied/seveso regulations.
